This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_MedicationCodeHOT7_CS defines many codes, of which the following are a subset:

Code

name: JP_MedicationCodeHOT7_CS
title: JP Core MedicationCode HOT7 CodeSystem
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

description: 医薬品HOT7コードのコードシステム
